DOC.brief_summary: Open pilot study to collect information regarding the effect of atorvastatin on patients with active Crohns disease.
DOC.brief_title: Atorvastatin in Moderate Active Crohns Disease
DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis of Crohns disease Creactive protein level > 2 mg/L in absence of an infection Fecal calprotectin > 250 mg/kg or CDAI > 150 CDAI > 450 Prednisolone dosage above 15 mg/day
